none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on April 14, 2024 Description from Terminal Escape:
 Appropriately dreary desert psych from Leeds. Serious '90s REV + SPIRITUALIZED + LIPS vibes, even more so than on their debut in 2020 (Psychedelic Unknowns was released the following year), and the way SELF-IMMOLATION MUSIC deftly annihilate the simplest riffs is.....something special. There's something truly special about a band who sets their sights on a goal and then surpasses it, and that when these chaps (continue to) do. PSYCHEDELIC UNKNOWNS
https://selfimmolationmusic.bandcamp.com/music

seo.title: Self-Immolation Music - Psychedelic Unknowns - Terminal Escape
